info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 17 at 3:10PM CDT by NWS Memphis TN
info.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi...Tennessee...
Tombigbee River near Amory
Tombigbee River at Bigbee
Buttahatchie River near Aberdeen
Tennessee River at Savannah
...The Flood Warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Mississippi...
Coldwater River at Marks
Yalobusha River at Calhoun City
For the Tennessee River...including Pickwick Dam, Savannah, Saltillo, Perryville, Johnsonville...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Tombigbee River...including Fulton, Bigbee, Amory, Aberdeen L & D...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Buttahatchie River...including Aberdeen...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring.
* WHERE...Tennessee River at Savannah.
* WHEN...Until further notice.
* IMPACTS...At 378.0 feet, Coffee Landing Road is flooded. Most lots at Big River Plantation Resort are flooded. West end of Hamilton Rock Lane is covered.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Monday the stage was 371.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 2:00 PM CDT Monday was 371.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 377.9 feet Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 370.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis.
The next statement will be issued as needed.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE
